looking forward to?
Uh I don't know. I mean, uh just looking

it's obviously really exciting to be
here. Um
I don't know. It's just exciting to be
here and be around the guys, I guess,
and enjoy this experience.
It's kind of cool to be around the

Of course.
It's kind of hockey versus just
Of course. Yeah. I mean, uh, I've never
never seen a live Stanley Cup game, so
I'm certainly excited for that. Um,
obviously this kind of gives you the
behind thes scenes look at, you know,
what they're what they're doing to get
ready and all that kind of stuff. So,

whether it's next year or the year after
that this could be you playing in uh, a
playoffs or Stanley Cup final down the
road?
Um, I don't know. I mean, just that's a
little bit far down the road. I mean,
I'm just looking forward to the draft
and hoping uh obviously uh can can get

some point some.
Who are you most looking forward to
seeing live at the game?
Uh it's pretty hard to pick in a game
like this. I mean, you look at the guys,
the long list of talent, whether it's uh
Patrick Kane, Steven Stamco, Tyler
Johnson, Taves, I mean it uh the list
goes on and on. So, I'm just excited to

I've been watching it on TV and uh
looking forward to seeing what it's like

You ever met any of those guys like

Uh I know uh Stam Coach just a bit
through uh working out and uh we work

Do you have any from Sweden, so it's a
corny question, but if you had any
Swedish favorite players
Uh Matt Sundine, I think just being a a
Toronto guy. Um you know, he's kind of a

Yeah, it's been crazy. It's been a very
busy uh couple of weeks and um but it's

It's a position that uh every guy wants
to be in and I'm very lucky to to be in

forward to the next couple of weeks and
uh you know ultimately get into the
draft. So,
what does the rest of your summer
probably look like? Cuz I imagine you're
looking to step into the NHL this
season.
Yeah, I mean uh just a lot of training
obviously. Um just trying to get bigger,
stronger, faster, all that kind of
stuff. So, you know, a big summer ahead

got to do all those things.

or that learning curve is going to be

I think uh there's going to be some

Yeah, it was it was fine. I mean, uh,
went well. I mean, it was a nice meeting

the guys and see all the guys and um
just kind of get to talk to them and and
meet them a bit more.
Was it the evolution of sinking in that
this is actually happening?
Moments that you just kind of this is
real. This is your
Yeah, I mean it's it's a dream come true
like I said. I mean, last week is the
combine and um you know, I remember
looking back last year just wishing I
could be a part of that and um you know,
and now all this is happening now and um
you know, it's been a whirlwind and um
you know, like I said, it's been a dream

the experience and really looking
forward to the draft there and couple of

You said you hadn't met Jack at all. Has

bit?
Yeah. Yeah, for sure. I mean, I met him
uh at the combine and kind of hung
around and uh you know, obviously uh you

How much have you kind of studied or

maybe even kind of imagine that I might
fit in with this guy or
um not too much to be honest. I mean, um
I'm not drafted there or anything like
that. So, um, I guess I'll do that a
little bit more if, uh, if that's where
I'm drafted.
Have you had any if Jordan or, uh,
Taylor, I know they reached out to you
right after the box lottery. Have they
Have you had any other?
Uh, no, not really. But, uh, Teddy Pcell
actually works out at, uh, Gary's gym
and, uh, same with Derek Roy. So, I kind
of see them around a bit. You
think that'll if you do go to anything,
you think that'll help having guys that
went first overall as well?
obviously in the same position.
Uh yeah, I think so. I mean, uh they've
been through it. They understand the
position. So, I mean, whatever advice
they have, uh you know, will obviously
help.

video_title: Connor McDavid being interviewed at SCF Game 3
